FAQ
1. When will this offer end?
Our 30% Offer Ends at 3rd May 2019.

2. Can I connect from multiple locations?
Yes! Install your Remote Desktop Software, and enjoy access to your VPS anywhere, using any devices.

3. Any setup, contract or hidden fees?
Absolutely NO! Our pricing is 100% transparent. You only pay for what you use.

4. Can I customize my own Windows VPS?
Of course! Pick a nearest plan, and talk to our customer support live to get your most suitable plan. No charges applied.

5. Do you offer Money-Back Guarantee?
Yes! We offer you 30 Days Money-Back Guarantee. No Stress. No Hassle.

6. Can I upgrade to a higher plan in the future?
Definitely! You can choose to upgrade anytime you want. Don't worry about losing data or downtime. We promise smooth and seamless Windows VPS hosting upgrade experience.
